name: Sarah Federman
title: creative UI engineer
about: I love working in the sweet spot between design and code. I use cutting-edge technology to design & develop usable applications and interactive experiences. I'm passionate about design & development and I live to learn constantly. My focus is on frontend engineering, but I often hop the fence and work on visual design and UX or do some backend development. I have previously worked with Adobe and LinkedIn and I'm currently looking for my next new challenge! Let's work together!
